mapper.select: select top 1 * from RYTreasureDB.dbo.PhoneSMS where PhoneNumber = #{phoneNumber} and SmsCode = #{smsCode} and TypeID = 1 and IsUse = 0 order by ID desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RYTreasureDB.dbo.PhoneSMS(UserID, SmsCode, TypeID, IsUse, InsertTime, PhoneNumber) VALUES (#{userID}, #{smsCode}, #{typeID}, #{isUse}, #{insertTime}, #{phoneNumber})
